stories.original_headline: Scientists discover what’s linking floods and droughts across the planet
stories.original_summary: Scientists tracking Earth’s water from space discovered that El Niño and La Niña are synchronizing floods and droughts across continents. stories.fantasy_headline: Wizards Uncover Secrets of Global Floods and Droughts
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand Wizards of the Celestial Tower have used their scrying globes to track the Great Water Spirits. They found these ancient spirits are causing widespread floods and droughts across distant lands at the same time. When the spirits stir intensely, the balance of nature shifts dramatically.

stories.original_headline: This new sugar tastes like the real thing without the usual downsides
stories.original_summary: Scientists at Tufts have found a way to turn common glucose into a rare sugar that tastes almost exactly like table sugar—but with far fewer downsides. stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists Brew a Wondrous New Sweetener for All
stories.fantasy_story: Alchemists from the Arcane Kitchen have discovered how to turn common sweet sap into a rare, enchanted sugar. This new sweetener tastes just like the finest honey but without its usual ailments. Using tiny sprites within magical vats, they can now produce it easily and affordably for all.

stories.original_summary: Robot vacuums are impressive devices that will clean your floors well and — thanks to bigger batteries and better robot brains — rarely get tired of doing their job. stories.fantasy_headline: Artificers Unveil Newest Magical Cleaning Constructs
stories.fantasy_story: The Artificers' Guild has presented its finest enchanted cleaning constructs. These impressive automatons keep your castle floors spotless, sweeping and scrubbing tirelessly. With powerful arcane power cells and clever enchanted gears, these house sprites rarely grow weary of their duties.
